soap.local.api

Class IProfilerAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.soap.SOAPServiceBase
      • soap.local.api.IProfilerAPI

  • public class IProfilerAPI
extends SOAPServiceBase
    API to access services offered by the Guidewire Profiler.

    • Method Detail

      • setEnableProfilerForBatchProcess

        void setEnableProfilerForBatchProcess(boolean enable,
                                    BatchProcessType type,
                                    boolean hiResTime,
                                    boolean enableStackTracing,
                                    boolean enableQueryOptimizerTracing,
                                    boolean enableExtendedQueryTracing,
                                    int dbmsCounterThresholdMs,
                                    boolean diffDbmsCounters)
        Enable or disable the profiler for batch processes of the given type
        Parameters:
        enable - whether to enable or disable
        type - batch process type
        hiResTime - whether to use hi-resolution clock for timing (Windows only)
        enableStackTracing - to allow stack tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false
        enableQueryOptimizerTracing - whether to allow query optimizer tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
        enableExtendedQueryTracing - whether to allow extended query tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
        dbmsCounterThresholdMs - The threshold for how long a database operation can take before generating a report using dbms counters for the interval (start of profiling session, end of profiling session). Use 0 to disable.
        diffDbmsCounters - Whether diffing DBMS counters is enabled. Only meaningful if ProfilerEnabled and DbmsCounterThresholdMs are true.

      • setEnableProfilerForBatchProcessAndWorkQueue

        void setEnableProfilerForBatchProcessAndWorkQueue(boolean enable,
                                                BatchProcessType type,
                                                boolean hiResTime,
                                                boolean enableStackTracing,
                                                boolean enableQueryOptimizerTracing,
                                                boolean enableExtendedQueryTracing,
                                                int dbmsCounterThresholdMs,
                                                boolean diffDbmsCounters)
        Enable or disable the profiler for batch processes of the given type and their associated work queue
        Parameters:
        enable - whether to enable or disable
        type - batch process type
        hiResTime - whether to use hi-resolution clock for timing (Windows only)
        enableStackTracing - whether to allow stack tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false
        enableQueryOptimizerTracing - whether to allow query optimizer tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
        enableExtendedQueryTracing - whether to allow extended query tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
        dbmsCounterThresholdMs - The threshold for how long a database operation can take before generating a report using dbms counters for the interval (start of profiling session, end of profiling session). Use 0 to disable.
        diffDbmsCounters - Whether diffing DBMS counters is enabled. Only meaningful if ProfilerEnabled and DbmsCounterThresholdMs are true.

      • setEnableProfilerForMessageDestination

        void setEnableProfilerForMessageDestination(boolean enable,
                                          int destinationID,
                                          boolean hiResTime,
                                          boolean enableStackTracing,
                                          boolean enableQueryOptimizerTracing,
                                          boolean enableExtendedQueryTracing,
                                          int dbmsCounterThresholdMs,
                                          boolean diffDbmsCounters)
        Enable or disable the profiler for the given message destinations
        Parameters:
        enable - whether to enable or disable
        destinationID -
        hiResTime - whether to use hi-resolution clock for timing (Windows only)
        enableStackTracing - whether to allow stack tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false
        enableQueryOptimizerTracing - whether to allow query optimizer tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
        enableExtendedQueryTracing - whether to allow extended query tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
        dbmsCounterThresholdMs - The threshold for how long a database operation can take before generating a report using dbms counters for the interval (start of profiling session, end of profiling session). Use 0 to disable.
        diffDbmsCounters - Whether diffing DBMS counters is enabled. Only meaningful if ProfilerEnabled and DbmsCounterThresholdMs are true.

      • setEnableProfilerForStartablePlugin

        void setEnableProfilerForStartablePlugin(boolean enable,
                                       String pluginName,
                                       boolean hiResTime,
                                       boolean enableStackTracing,
                                       boolean enableQueryOptimizerTracing,
                                       boolean enableExtendedQueryTracing,
                                       int dbmsCounterThresholdMs,
                                       boolean diffDbmsCounters)
        Enable or disable the profiler for the given StartablePlugin
        Parameters:
        enable - whether to enable or disable
        pluginName -
        hiResTime - whether to use hi-resolution clock for timing (Windows only)
        enableStackTracing - whether to allow stack tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false
        enableQueryOptimizerTracing - whether to allow query optimizer tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
        enableExtendedQueryTracing - whether to allow extended query tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
        dbmsCounterThresholdMs - The threshold for how long a database operation can take before generating a report using dbms counters for the interval (start of profiling session, end of profiling session). Use 0 to disable.
        diffDbmsCounters - Whether diffing DBMS counters is enabled. Only meaningful if ProfilerEnabled and DbmsCounterThresholdMs are true.

      • setEnableProfilerForSubsequentWebSessions

        void setEnableProfilerForSubsequentWebSessions(String name,
                                             boolean enable,
                                             boolean hiResTime,
                                             boolean enableStackTracing,
                                             boolean enableQueryOptimizerTracing,
                                             boolean enableExtendedQueryTracing,
                                             int dbmsCounterThresholdMs,
                                             boolean diffDbmsCounters)
        Enable or disable the profiler for subsequent new web sessions. Not recommended for production systems
        Parameters:
        name - name for the profiler session. optional; use null for the default name.
        enable - whether to enable or disable
        hiResTime - whether to use hi-resolution clock for timing (Windows only)
        enableStackTracing - whether to allow stack tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false
        enableQueryOptimizerTracing - whether to allow query optimizer tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
        enableExtendedQueryTracing - whether to allow extended query tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
        dbmsCounterThresholdMs - The threshold for how long a database operation can take before generating a report using dbms counters for the interval (start of profiling session, end of profiling session). Use 0 to disable.
        diffDbmsCounters - Whether diffing DBMS counters is enabled. Only meaningful if ProfilerEnabled and DbmsCounterThresholdMs are true.

      • setEnableProfilerForWebService

        void setEnableProfilerForWebService(boolean enable,
                                  String serviceName,
                                  String operationName,
                                  boolean hiResTime,
                                  boolean enableStackTracing,
                                  boolean enableQueryOptimizerTracing,
                                  boolean enableExtendedQueryTracing,
                                  int dbmsCounterThresholdMs,
                                  boolean diffDbmsCounters)
        Enable or disable the profiler for the given web service (service name, operation name) pair
        Parameters:
        enable - whether to enable or disable
        serviceName -
        operationName -
        hiResTime - whether to use hi-resolution clock for timing (Windows only)
        enableStackTracing - whether to allow stack tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false
        enableQueryOptimizerTracing - whether to allow query optimizer tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
        enableExtendedQueryTracing - whether to allow extended query tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
        dbmsCounterThresholdMs - The threshold for how long a database operation can take before generating a report using dbms counters for the interval (start of profiling session, end of profiling session). Use 0 to disable.
        diffDbmsCounters - Whether diffing DBMS counters is enabled. Only meaningful if ProfilerEnabled and DbmsCounterThresholdMs are true.

      • setEnableProfilerForWorkQueue

        void setEnableProfilerForWorkQueue(boolean enable,
                                 BatchProcessType type,
                                 boolean hiResTime,
                                 boolean enableStackTracing,
                                 boolean enableQueryOptimizerTracing,
                                 boolean enableExtendedQueryTracing,
                                 int dbmsCounterThresholdMs,
                                 boolean diffDbmsCounters)
        Enable or disable the profiler for work queues associated with the given batch process type
        Parameters:
        enable - whether to enable or disable
        type - batch process type
        hiResTime - whether to use hi-resolution clock for timing (Windows only)
        enableStackTracing - whether to allow stack tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false
        enableQueryOptimizerTracing - whether to allow query optimizer tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
        enableExtendedQueryTracing - whether to allow extended query tracing (expensive) or not. This is ignored if enable is false.
        dbmsCounterThresholdMs - The threshold for how long a database operation can take before generating a report using dbms counters for the interval (start of profiling session, end of profiling session). Use 0 to disable.
        diffDbmsCounters - Whether diffing DBMS counters is enabled. Only meaningful if ProfilerEnabled and DbmsCounterThresholdMs are true.
